gui.main
Class MainController

java.lang.Object
  gui.common.Controller
      gui.main.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController, IMainController
public class MainController
extends Controller
implements IMainController

Controller class for the main view. The main view allows the user to print reports and exit the application.
